item.title: Moparisthebest's Smiley Usage
item.dc:creator: @933pm 933pm
item.description:
@933pm wrote:

[quote=“Bowser jr, post:27, topic:298285”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=394688.msg2935364#msg2935364 date=1251524885]
Interesting idea, although this would have been easier and quicker for me to do with access to the database.

Anyhow, in 2008 I probably posted less because I was engaged in other pursuits, such as trying to become engaged and such, now I probably post as much as I did in 2006, if not more. (since there is more to talk about)

At one point, I realized I had a problem, and that I needed to cut back on the smileys or I would be stuck on them forever, so I started to slowly ween myself off from them, and apparently, according to this graph, it worked!!! (haven’t done that for awhile, feels good… ;D)
[/quote]
I have heard girls like you better if you use smilies, so you should use it.[/quote]

I have heard girls don’t exist on the interwebs.

Read full topic

item.title: Moparisthebest's Smiley Usage

Interesting idea, although this would have been easier and quicker for me to do with access to the database.

Anyhow, in 2008 I probably posted less because I was engaged in other pursuits, such as trying to become engaged and such, now I probably post as much as I did in 2006, if not more. (since there is more to talk about)

At one point, I realized I had a problem, and that I needed to cut back on the smileys or I would be stuck on them forever, so I started to slowly ween myself off from them, and apparently, according to this graph, it worked!!! (haven’t done that for awhile, feels good… ;D)
[/quote]

Gotta love that little ;D guy![/quote]

Haha, yea that is the extent of my graphics editing abilities, pretty crappy huh? ;D

Read full topic

item.description:

moparisthebest.
[/quote]
By moparisthebest, I mean the user, not the board as a whole, and his posts would include both those on moparscape and here.[/quote]

Yeah I know I read the script, (http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=1;sa=showPosts;start)

edit hahah if you look here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=1;sa=showPosts;start=5700 theres a in about every post!
